projects.title: SIM
description: I created this app while working in a small local shop.
With the goal of knowing what stock to take off the shelves at a glance, I created the proof of concept over a weekend.
SIM was then rewritten in SvelteKit and had more features added after discussion with management.

projects.title: Starboard
description: As a joke, I created this app where my friends would compete for stars, inspired by the concept of a 'star board' from Primary School.
I would list simple tasks such as 'Draw the interior of your fridge in MS Paint', or 'Make a word with the spice jars in your kitchen' and award stars based on how well they completed the task.
I wrote the app in SvelteKit, using IBM's Carbon Design System for the UI. It connects to a PostgreSQL database through the Prisma ORM.

projects.title: BitHunt
projects.shortDescription: AR Treasure Hunts for TU Dublin Students
description: During every Student Life festival, we would hide QR codes around the campus for students to scan and solve puzzles.
This allowed First Year students to get to know the campus and increase society membership!
I wrote the app in SvelteKit, and connected directly to a PostgreSQL database.

projects.title: Clerk
projects.shortDescription: Obsidian plugin for writing documents faster
description: I created Clerk to make it easier to write the Sysadmin Docs, Blog posts and meeting minutes easier for the TU Dublin Computer Science Society.
It creates correctly populates the 'frontmatter' metadata for markdown files which includes things like author, tags, meeting attendees, etc.
Clerk was written in TypeScript and uses the ObsidianMD API to interact with the markdown files.
